import React, { useState } from "react" import { Jumbotron, Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap" import NavBar from "./NavBar.js" import SignUpForm from "./SignUpForm.js" import SignInForm from "./SignInForm.js" export default function Landing(props) { const { buttonLabel, className } = props const [signUpModal, setSignUpModal] = useState(false) const toggleSignUp = () => setSignUpModal(!signUpModal) const [signInModal, setSignInModal] = useState(false) const toggleSignIn = () => setSignInModal(!signInModal) return (

Welcome to Fish Friends!

If this is your first time visiting us we encourage you to sign up to get the full experience.


If you're a returning angler you already know what to do.

Sign Up {/* {" "} */} Sign In {/* {" "} */}
) }
